Articles.Content:
I realised, that none of the companies in the game has a logo, so I came up with a first draft. Quite a stab in the dark without briefing and feedback from the customers.

Edited January 13, 2014 by Phlex

Oh my gosh, these look amazing

Do you make requests?
That depends. And usually I'd have to charge you.
That looks very impressive!

Thanks. I'm quite pleased with some designs, while others are below par. I didn't change them though, to keep it more realistic, since there are always customers that chose the inferior design and I'm no artist, I provide a service so the customer gets, what he wants.

I'd have to charge you.

Dammit, i'm poor
I think I'm in love.
one note, you misspelled FLOOYD dynamics, you spelled it FLOODY. XD. Ah well, they look awesome anyways. SQUAD! COME ADMIRE THIS AND BE INSPIRED!
This thread is definitely going to be the fanwork thread in daily kerbal Wonderful work there!

one note, you misspelled FLOOYD dynamics, you spelled it FLOODY. XD. Ah well, they look awesome anyways. SQUAD! COME ADMIRE THIS AND BE INSPIRED!

Damn! Double checking wasn't enough. Thanks for the hint, I wanted to redo the last picture anyway.

Edited January 14, 2014 by Phlex
This is simply amazing.
I like how the logos do actually seem relevant to the company, the only exception being 'Moving Parts' I think. What did you think of that one yourself?
Very good job on the logos!

I like how the logos do actually seem relevant to the company, the only exception being 'Moving Parts' I think. What did you think of that one yourself?

I didn't think much. There are just some companies like Siemens or Canon, that use their names in combination with a specific font as their company brand. I just wanted to add some diversity, and like I said: No customer, no briefing, no feedback, neatly leads to "wild stab in the dark".
these are awesome!!!
You need to enter these logos into the company logo contest

You need to enter these logos into the company logo contest

Great minds think alike.
Dude, send these to squad for the contest!
Yes, submit these, these look so fitting to the Space Center's style!

Yes, submit these, these look so fitting to the Space Center's style!

I'm not sure that the Jebediah Kerman one is entirely suitable....

I always imagined that a company that owned a junkyard and sold second hand rocket parts would have a far less corporate and clean logo, if indeed any logo at all.

I don't picture jeb in a suit, is what I'm saying. Jeb probably designed his own logo, in comic sans and clip art.
Yea, send em off! Maybe some will make it!
Yep company logo thing, and we'll soon be able to welome Phlex kerman to the team
It's funny, we were conceiving the idea of the contest when this post popped up in here. Good job jumping the gun, Phlex Seriously though, a submission is worth the shot.
Well, what do you know! I have a knack for timing. Usually it's bad timing though.
Great Job!!!
